trans-unit.source: Wraps a [Task Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d82e2485-e5f0-4936-a357-745bacccc299).
trans-unit.target: 包裝 [Task 項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d82e2485-e5f0-4936-a357-745bacccc299)。

trans-unit.source: This is an immutable class
trans-unit.target: 這是不可變的類別

trans-unit.source: Gets the unevaluated Condition attribute of this task.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個工作的未評估 Condition 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Condition attribute value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 Condition 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不存在，則會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: Location of the condition, if any
trans-unit.target: 條件的位置 (如果有的話)

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unevaluated ContinueOnError attribute of the task.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作的未評估 ContinueOnError 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the unevaluated ContinueOnError attribute of the task.
trans-unit.target: 傳回工作的未評估 ContinueOnError 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty string if the attribute is not present.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性不存在，則會傳回空字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Task Element (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d82e2485-e5f0-4936-a357-745bacccc299) and [How to: Ignore Errors in Tasks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2f1ca4f-787b-44bd-bc64-81a036025e96).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[工作項目 (MSBuild)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d82e2485-e5f0-4936-a357-745bacccc299)和[如何： 忽略工作中的錯誤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e2f1ca4f-787b-44bd-bc64-81a036025e96)。

trans-unit.source: Location of the ContinueOnError attribute, if any
trans-unit.target: ContinueOnError 屬性的位置 (如果有的話)

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />。

trans-unit.source: Location of the original element
trans-unit.target: 原始項目的位置

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />。

trans-unit.source: Unevaluated MSBuildArchitecture on the task.
trans-unit.target: 工作上未評估的 MSBuildArchitecture。

trans-unit.source: May be empty string.
trans-unit.target: 可能是空字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Location of the MSBuildArchitecture attribute, if any
trans-unit.target: MSBuildArchitecture 屬性的位置 (如果有的話)

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />。

trans-unit.source: Unevaluated MSBuildRuntime on the task.
trans-unit.target: 工作上未評估的 MSBuildRuntime。

trans-unit.source: May be empty string.
trans-unit.target: 可能是空字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Location of the MSBuildRuntime attribute, if any
trans-unit.target: MSBuildRuntime 屬性的位置 (如果有的話)

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ElementLocation" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the task, possibly qualified, as it appears in the project.
trans-unit.target: 取得出現在專案中的工作名稱 (可能是完整名稱)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the task, possibly qualified, as it appears in the project.
trans-unit.target: 傳回出現在專案中的工作名稱 (可能是完整名稱)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an ordered set of the output property and item objects of this task.
trans-unit.target: 取得此工作之輸出屬性和項目物件的已排序集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered set of the output property and item objects of the task.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此工作之輸出屬性和項目物件的已排序集合。

trans-unit.source: This is a read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: 此為唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets an unordered set of the task parameter names and unevaluated values of this task.
trans-unit.target: 取得此工作之工作參數名稱和未評估值的未排序集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an unordered set of the task parameter names and unevaluated values of this task.
trans-unit.target: 傳回此工作之工作參數名稱和未評估值的未排序集合。

trans-unit.source: This is a read-only collection.
trans-unit.target: 此為唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: Condition and ContinueOnError attributes, which have their own properties, are not included in this collection.
trans-unit.target: 不包含條件和 ContinueOnError 屬性有自己的屬性，這個集合中。
